评论详情: This product was exactly as described, it was beautiful in the pink, the weight of the material was very good quality and a value for your money. At my current age I like clothing that are easily worn and washable it met the test just had to steam a few wrinkles out. I received so many compliments on this outfit, it versatile with dressing it up or just wearing it with tennis shoes. I choose a pair of boots the same color and my purse to match and dressed it up. I will buy again for winter sweats pants and shirt. I feel you can wear it as a sweater as well.

I loved this lounge outfit. Material was very soft & comfortable. I was very disappointed when it was too small. For reference, I’m 5’7” and weigh 183lbs and ordered my usual size, a large. Check the size guide & order up!
It’s a cute outfit, but there are two different versions of the brown two different colors and they keep sending me the wrong one
A definite favorite for the season.  Pleased with style, color, fit, and quality.
Soft .. true to size and very stylish

I want this in every color! This is the most comfortable and stylish set ever. I've gotten more compliments on this outfit than almost anything else in my closet. I've worn it on planes, in long road trips, to the office, and even as pajamas. It's the most versatile outfit I own.
This outfit can be dressy by putting on some extra jewelry and pumps or casual with sneakers, slippers, or any casual shoe. Fit perfectly.

I’m 5.5 135lb I ordered a small. These well made super soft knit sets tend to run a little big. Which is why we love them so much. Great quality well worth the money. The only thing I recommend is wash on gentle & dry flat. Then toss in the dryer. It comes out softer after each wash.
Did not come with top

This set is so soft and adorable. You can dress it up or down. It fits PERFECT. For reference, I bought a size small. I’m 5ft2in and ~117 lbs. The best prime day deal!
The comfort, quick shipping, sale price, the fit, the color, the material-a great purchase!

The blue color was stunning in person. The fabric is soft, very warm, and has a nice drape to it. It is thick without being heavy and stiff. I ordered a small and the top fit well, but the waistband on the pants was very snug. I just wish they would put these outfits on models that were not tall and thin so I could see someone more typical of the average woman. I felt the silhouette was not flattering at all. If you want something warm and cozy to wear around the house or on errands, when comfort is the most important object, this would be nice to have. But if you're going for something to flattering your shape, this is not it.

True to size. Great quality. Both colors I ordered were just what I wanted!!!! Great price for the quality!!!! Love both the Cream & Khaki colors!!!

评论概述: Excellent Outfit for Errands and travel
评论详情: This is a great travel outfit and so so comfortable.  I've ordered other suits from different brands similar to this one and I would reorder.  Just want to point out, that the top isn't as oversized as it looks in the photo.  It was a bit more regular fit on my pasta loving torso.  (Pasta > oversized sweatshirt look).  Also, this suit has that reverse seem embellishment and well,  it would look better without it, imo.  Take a look at some of the photos closely and decided if that is something you like, and if not, there are plenty of other options in other brands without it.  Happy shopping.
Bought this for my wife and she loves it. Soft, well made and colorful, what else could you want?
